name: Pasta Carbonara
instructions: Cook pasta. Fry bacon. Mix eggs and cheese. Combine all.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: Cook chicken. Add vegetables. Stir in soy sauce. Serve over rice.

name: Vegetable Curry
instructions: Cook potatoes and carrots. Add peas, coconut milk, and curry powder. Simmer until thickened.

name: Beef Tacos
instructions: Cook beef with taco seasoning. Serve in tortillas with lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
